extendedInfo.description: Help!  The park is full of trash.  Please help us clean it up!  We are going to host a big event and it cannot look this way.  PLEASE HELP US!There are two ways to play.The first is to select motion sensor.  Tilt the phone to move the catcher.The second is to select Touch.  There will be a white box under the catcher.  Press and slide your finger on the box to move the catcher.
